resources.string: "I've read and agree to the User Agreement and Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agreed to Facemoji Privacy Policy."
"I've read and agreed to Kika Privacy Policy."
AI button allows you to trigger Mi AI and use Mi AI shortcuts.
Double press AI button to complete custom tasks
Press and hold AI button to talk to Mi AI
Press AI button to view Mi AI shortcuts
Gallery allows you to manage, optimize, and edit photos and videos on your device, as well as sync them to Xiaomi Cloud.
This app allows you to install third party apps, scan them before installation, and give recommendations after it.
You can use this app for calculations, converting units and currencies, and estimating your mortgage repayments.
You can use Camera to take photos and shoot videos.

"In order to provide you with better services, your device may periodically send your device version information, device identification data (including IMEI/IMSI/MSISDN/MAC address, MEID/ICCID), and approximate location information (including base station ID) to the carrier via WLAN, mobile data network, or free SMS. The carrier promises to analyze relevant information only to improve the quality of services or to provide customized services or technologies, and won't disclose relevant information to third parties in any form that identifies you personally. The specific carrier statement shall prevail. Consult your carrier regarding the cost of using this service."
You can use this app to view time, as well as use timer, world clock, stopwatch, set alarms, and more.
You can choose turn off location access in Settings > Additional settings > Privacy or restrict permissions for individual apps in Security.

"In order to improve the services provided to you, the mobile network operator of your choice may upload your personal data and the info about this device to its servers using WLAN networks or mobile data connection. This information will only be used for statistical purposes in order to improve the quality of the services and provide more personalized content. This information won't be used to identify you personally and won't be disclosed to third parties."
You can use this app for navigation, as well as viewing coordinates, atmospheric pressure, and altitude.
Swipe up to enter the system
Content Center aggregates content and services from multiple channels. Here you can read articles, watch videos, view daily featured items, and receive content recommendations.
Keep holding down two fingers to enable accessibility.
"If you aren't connected to WLAN now, your device will use mobile data. Using mobile data may generate additional carrier fees."
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, verify Mi Pay transactions, or to sign in to apps and services.
Use your fingerprint to unlock your device, or to sign in to apps and services.
Send diagnostic data to locate and analyze system issues and improve user experience. Such data may include personal information (e.g. IP, location, etc.)
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service."

"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose not to use this app or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose not to use this app in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this product. You can choose not to use this product in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service. You can choose not to use this service in such cases."

"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to sign out or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this feature. You can choose not to use this feature in such cases."
"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this service."

"If you don't agree to grant such permissions or share and upload your personal information, you won't be able to use this app. You can choose to uninstall, sign out, or restrict permissions in the Settings in such cases."
\"Downloads\" is using Xunlei to download items on your device. This tool works for GetApps, system updates, themes, videos, and browser downloads.

You turned on TalkBack by pressing the screen with 2 fingers for more than 10 seconds. TalkBack provides voice feedback for people with visual impairments. If you turned it on by accident, tap the Cancel button, and then double tap the screen.
Quick apps Framework allows you to create and provide services in quick apps.
Mi Link allows your device to connect to Bluetooth devices nearby. To be able to find devices nearby, allow Mi Link to connect to the internet.
Mi Services Framework allows you to use Mi Account, Mi Push, Mi Stats, and MIUI BI.

To provide you with these services, Mi Services Framework (Mi Account, Mi Push, Mi Stats, MIUI BI) needs to connect to the internet, access your location, phone number, IMEI, and IMSI, and allow your device to receive push notifications
Games plug-in allows you to sign in, create orders, complete payments, use coupons, and participate in promotion events.

To be able to work normally, Google Play needs to connect to the internet, access your location, be able to record audio, make calls, access calendar events, call history, sensors, storage, camera, device info, and accounts.
No network connection. View the Privacy Policy for this keyboard at %s.
"Choose the default keyboard that you'll use for writing messages, notes, and just about everything else. Note that you can install other third-party keyboards later."
Location-based services find products and services near you.
Wallpaper Carousel allows you to get fresh images delivered to your Lock screen daily.
"I've read and agreed to Mint Keyboard Privacy Policy"
"You don't have an internet connection. View the Privacy Policy at %s."
"You don't have an internet connection. View the User Agreement at %s."
This app allows you to create, view, and edit notes.

"After turning this feature off, you'll no longer receive personalized ads. However, you'll still receive ads that are irrelevant to your interests. You can learn more about personalized ads in Xiaomi Privacy Policy. Turn off personalized ads anyway?"
Personalize ads based on your interests
MIUI will select the best time to download and install updates. Your device will be rebooted automatically to apply changes.
Get curated images and stories delivered to your Lock screen daily. %1$s and %2$s
Allow apps to access your location
Usage stats which help us locate and solve issues may contain your personal info
Help us improve our products and services by sharing your usage stats with us. View details
For signing in with Mi Account
For accessing storage in order to parse and scan installation packages
For accessing call history in order to display blocked items
For accessing phone status, recording calls, and pausing recordings during incoming calls
For providing Blocklist functionality and calling emergency contacts
For identifying services associated with different devices
For caching downloaded items and saving them on your device
For accessing IMEI to provide services associated with your device
For saving photos and videos on device
For signing in and managing system accounts
For sending messages to blocked contacts
For accessing IMEI in order to identify devices
For accessing network type in order to optimize and adjust downloadable items
Access phone number, IMEI, and IMSI:
For saving images to Gallery and publishing statuses
For taking photos, recording videos, and using flash
For saving, editing, and syncing photos and videos
For adding items to call history and deleting blocked calls
Access and save files and photos on your device:
For accessing, saving, and caching items on your device
For accessing and saving audio recordings
For recording audio while recording video
For accessing and saving screen recordings
For performing virus scan and optimizing your device
For signing in and managing system accounts in order to provide Xunlei services
(Including POCO Launcher Privacy Policy and User Agreement)
We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.
" View the selected keyboard's Privacy Policy."
You can use this app to record audio and back up recordings to the cloud.
To allow us to provide you with basic services, you need to grant the following permissions in order for us to collect your personal information:
To allow us to provide you with basic services, you need to connect to the internet and grant the following permissions in order for us to collect your personal information:
"This app allows you to record what's happening on your screen."
You can use this app to clear trash on your device, find and neutralize viruses, optimize performance for gaming, save battery, manage apps, permissions, and more.
For signing in and managing system accounts
"I've read and agreed to the terms and conditions."
<Data>Read and agree to our <a href=%1$s>Privacy Policy</a >.</Data>
<Data>Before using our services, read and agree to <a href=%1$s>Xunlei Privacy Policy</a >.</Data>
"Couldn't find SIM card. Make sure SIM card is properly installed and you have sufficient funds on your balance."
Allow connecting to mobile data networks? If you do, the SIM card you insert will be used to connect to mobile data networks.
To insert your SIM card, read the instructions that came with your device.
"SIM card couldn't connect to the network"
"Your SIM card couldn't connect to a valid carrier network. Make sure you have sufficient funds on your balance and try to connect again."
Make sure you know how to use full screen gestures before selecting this option.

"Read our User Agreement and Privacy Policy to understand what information we collect, how we use it, and what choices are available to you. You must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before you can use MIUI. %s and Mi Account components will connect to the internet and acquire your location."
Mi services, Mi SIM activation services, Xiaomi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Games, MIUI Daemon, MSA system components, translation services, Quick apps, App vault, statistics, Mi Link

"
You must agree to Facemoji Privacy Policy before using this feature."

"
You must agree to Kika Privacy Policy before using this feature."

"
You must agree to Mint Keyboard Privacy Policy before using this feature."

Before using MIUI, you must read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy. While your device is being activated, Mi SIM Activation Service, Xiaomi Cloud, Find device, Home screen, Frequent phrases, Translation Service, MIUI Daemon, HTML Viewer, AI Assistant, Battery and performance, Power Detector, Joyose, OS AI Setting, Permissions Manager, and Updater will connect to the network. Smart services will connect to the network and access your location.
Mi AI allows you to use voice controls, but it consumes more power (+1% every hour).
"You'll be able to use Mi AI in these cases:r 1. When the screen is on.r 2. When you're listening to music with your screen off."
Say \"Mi AI\" into your phone. Mi AI will recognize your voice and will be able to control your device.
